<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A soul chain is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60)_ that has become cursed after a [forge-spurned](/Monsters.aspx?ID=473) used it to kill a creature and trap its soul. In the hands of a forge-spurned, a soul chain inflicts an additional 1d6 fire damage on a hit. Other creatures can use a _soul chain_ as a standard _+1 striking spiked chain_. A _soul chain_ fuses with its wielder the first time the wielder damages a living creature with the weapon. A character who dies while carrying a _soul chain_ must attempt a DC 20 Will save; on a failure, they're immediately transformed into a forge-spurned. Carrying multiple soul chains doesn't increase the DC of the save, but the carrier must attempt the save once for each chain they carry.
